verbs.description: [ARG1: WASHINGTON ( AP] ) — [V: Questioned] [ARGM-MNR: intently] [ARG0: by a Senate committee] , [ARG1: President Donald Trump 's son] struck a firmly unapologetic tone , deflected many queries and said he did n't think there
